statement.p: Mr. Breuer is very proud of his hybrid vehicle, so he collected data about the number of gallons (x) at fill-up together with the number of miles (y) on that trip. The data is below:
On average, how many miles does Mr. Breuer get per gallon? (This would be the slope of the linear regression equation.) Round your answer to the nearest mile.
If Mr. Breuer's vehicle holds 9 gallons, how many miles can he drive on a tank? Round your answer to the nearest mile.
